Content:: The Directorate-General for Neighbourhood and Enlargement Negotiations (DG NEAR) is a Directorate-General of the European Commission. The body is responsible for the enlargement process of the European Union and for the European Neighbourhood Policy. The European Union over the years has expanded to 27 members from the first six Member States who signed the Treaty of Rome.  This article about the European Union is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Directorate-General for Neighbourhood and Enlargement Negotiations - Wikipedia
